bio: GoPlus Security is a user security network in Web3. GoPlus aims to establish a transparent, open, and scalable web3 user security ecosystem
contributionDescription:
The following resource categories and their respective links are great examples of GoPlus Security’s Contributions.
Case Studies:
The following key case studies showcase how specific projects and companies tied to the Optimism ecosystem have benefited from the GoPlus Security API services:

1. [TokenPocket](https://goplussecurity.medium.com/tokenpocket-a-secure-and-simple-multi-chain-wallet-cebc5591f1d5) use case.
2. [ApeSpace](https://goplussecurity.medium.com/apespace-the-ultimate-crypto-analytics-platform-for-all-traders-fe4d08c66fda) use case.
3. [DexCheck](https://goplussecurity.medium.com/dexcheck-the-next-generation-data-analytics-platform-for-defi-and-nft-8ee29ec2d6b0) use case. 

Articles & Publications:
https://goplussecurity.medium.com/

contributionLinks.description: GoPlus Security provides open source material.

impactDescription:
Daily Token Detection Count for Each Access Point. 
The top 4 in this realm have had the highest usage of GoPlus Security’s API services in consecutive order:
1. [DEXTools](https://www.dextools.io/app/en/pairs): a cryptocurrency-related platform and toolset that is multi-chain, Optimism included.
2. [DEX Screener](https://dexscreener.com/): a powerful price analysis platform that is multi-chain, Optimism included.
3. [OKX](https://www.okx.com/): an innovative cryptocurrency exchange and wallet that is multi-chain, Optimism included.
4. [Bitget Wallet](https://web3.bitget.com/en) (Formerly known as BitKeep): a world-class multi-chain crypto wallet, Optimism included.

fundingSources.description: This is our first time applying for the RetroPGF.
